code: import React from"react";import'../styles/TaskItem.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskItem=_ref=>{let{task,onToggleTask,onSetPriority}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-item ".concat(task.priority," ").concat(task.completed?"completed":""),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:task.completed,onChange:()=>onToggleTask(task)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:task.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"due-date",children:task.dueDate}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"priority-selector",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onSetPriority(task,"high"),children:"High"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onSetPriority(task,"medium"),children:"Medium"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onSetPriority(task,"low"),children:"Low"})]})]});};export default TaskItem;
